attributes.action: prenuptial agreement for London Underground travel cards
attributes.additional_details:
Allow commuters to get a simple and hassle free travel service from the London Underground.  If terms are not met for commuters with an hassle free we will not pay the extra inflation on Oyster cards per month.

If we to receive a hassle free service, commuters are happy to pay the extra cash at the end of the month reoccurring throughout the year.

The better the service will guarantee commuters pay the extra costs to travel.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor of London and the Greater London Assembly.
